features.feature: World-crossing puzzles that combine logical thinking and careful planning
Discovery-focused gameplay that lets players choose their own path through the gardens
Plants, creatures, and Gardenbots that offer engaging and entertaining interactions
Vibrant, minimalist art style inspired by comic books and architectural drawing
Generative soundscapes that respond to the player’s presence
